name: Central Park
shortDescription: A large public park in New York City.
description: Central Park is one of the most famous parks in the world, offering a peaceful retreat in the heart of New York City.
advicesForTourists: Best to visit early morning to avoid crowds. Don't miss the Central Park Zoo!

name: Louvre Museum
shortDescription: The world's largest art museum in Paris.
description: The Louvre is home to thousands of works of art, including the Mona Lisa and the Venus de Milo.
advicesForTourists: Buy tickets in advance and plan to arrive early to avoid long lines.

name: Tokyo Tower
shortDescription: A communications and observation tower in Tokyo.
description: Tokyo Tower offers incredible views of the Tokyo skyline and a variety of shops and restaurants.
advicesForTourists: Visit at night for stunning views of the illuminated city.

name: Sydney Opera House
shortDescription: A world-renowned performing arts center in Sydney.
description: The Sydney Opera House is known for its unique design and hosts numerous performances each year.
advicesForTourists: Take a guided tour to learn about the history and architecture of this iconic building.

name: Great Wall of China
shortDescription: An ancient series of walls and fortifications in northern China.
description: The Great Wall is one of the most iconic landmarks in the world, stretching over 13,000 miles.
advicesForTourists: Wear comfortable shoes, as some sections can be quite steep.
